description:
Eula's combo attacks can be quite complicated, but some optimal combos include the following:

Eula's most generic, adaptable, and reliable combination is capable of. This is a simple, beginner-friendly combination that every Eula player should learn and master. If there is only one combination to learn here, it is this one.

**Standard DPS rotation**:
> Use Eula's Elemental Skill (E)
> Use Eula's Elemental Burst (Q)
> N4 Attack
> Hold Eula's Elemental Skill (Hold E)
> N4 Attack
> Detonation

For more Eula combos better suited to your team comp and playstyle, it is recommended to check out KQM's Eula guide below!
title: Eula | Playstyle
